frustum



Frustumf

typedef struct {
  Planef planes[6];
} Frustumf;
type: C struct
description: frustum float

typedef struct {
  Planed planes[6];
} Frustumd;

description: frustum double

Spheref

typedef struct {
  vec3f center;
  float radius;
} Spheref;

Sphered

typedef struct {
  vec3d  center;
  double radius;
} Sphered;

description: sphere double

FrustumResult

type: C enum
description: Frustum test result
FRUSTUM_INSIDE
FRUSTUM_OUSTIDE
FRUSTUM_INTERSECT
FRUSTUM_RESULT_COUNT

m_frustum_initd

void          m_frustum_initd(double *view, double *projection, double screen_depth, double *res);
type: C function
description: initialize a frustum
view: view matrix - mat4d
projection: projection matrix - mat4d
screen_depth: double
res: Frustumd
